title: Setup Steps
body_html:
Setup Steps

This section will provide detailed instructions on how to set up the small LLM and embedding environment for the proof of concept.

  • Environment requirements:
    • Python 3.8 or higher
    • Required libraries: transformers, sentence-transformers, faiss-cpu, numpy
  • Installation procedures:
    • Create and activate a virtual environment
    • Install dependencies using pip
  • Configuration settings:
    • Set up API keys if needed
    • Configure embedding model and index parameters
  • Testing and validation:
    • Verify installation by running sample embedding queries
    • Perform accuracy checks on embedding results

Further details will be added as the implementation progresses.
